div.p: My job is very demanding so it’s long hours you know as and when is needed so sometimes it has an impact on your personal life
and your social life where you potentially can’t, you know, be home at 5 o’clock or, you know, attend a certain thing you know
I used to work on Saturdays I don’t do that anymore but that has an impact but it’s one of those prices you pay I would imagine.
I’ve never suffered from any particular health ailment I would just say you need a lot of energy I think probably for any job that you do
so it’s very important to look after yourself and make sure that you have those energy resources I’d say.
